title: Config
description: A config for the MergeConflictResolution project.

analyzeConflicts.description: This defines if and how the 'analyze-conflicts' subcommand will be run.

cloneProjects.description: This flag sets if the 'clone-projects' subcommand will be run.

projectListInfos.description: The list of information about project lists.

outSuffix.description: The suffix of the output CSV file.

projectList.description: The path to the project list CSV file.

projectDir.description: The directory where all projects in the project list are located.

outDir.description: The directory to which the output files will be written.
